Interface CrudService<T extends AbstractEntity>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of entity this service manages, must extend AbstractEntity
All Known Subinterfaces:
FilterableCrudService<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
OrderService, PickupLocationService, ProductService, UserService
public interface CrudService<T extends AbstractEntity>
Generic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) service interface for entities. Provides common operations for managing entities that extend AbstractEntity.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bakery Application

  • Method Details

    • getRepository

      org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<T,Long> getRepository()
      Returns the JPA repository instance for this service.
      Returns:
      the repository for the entity type T

    • save

      default T save(User currentUser, T entity)
      Saves an entity to the database.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - the user performing the save operation
      entity - the entity to save
      Returns:
      the saved entity

    • delete

      default void delete(User currentUser, T entity)
      Deletes an entity from the database.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - the user performing the delete operation
      entity - the entity to delete
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if the entity is null

    • delete

      default void delete(User currentUser, long id)
      Deletes an entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - the user performing the delete operation
      id - the ID of the entity to delete
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if no entity with the given ID exists

    • count

      default long count()
      Returns the total count of entities in the database.
      Returns:
      the number of entities

    • load

      default T load(long id)
      Loads an entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the entity to load
      Returns:
      the loaded entity
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if no entity with the given ID exists

    • createNew

      T createNew(User currentUser)
      Creates a new instance of the entity type.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - the user creating the new entity
      Returns:
      a new entity instance
